bug.author: aht
bug.description:
<denchmark-h:h1>Summary</denchmark-h>
streamlit hello raises an Exception after install <denchmark-h:h1>Steps to reproduce</denchmark-h>
What are the steps we should take to reproduce the bug:
pip install streamlit streamlit hello
<denchmark-h:h2>Expected behavior:</denchmark-h>
Expected to see hello world examples. <denchmark-h:h2>Actual behavior:</denchmark-h>
<denchmark-code>Traceback (most recent call last): File "/Library/Frameworks/Python.framework/Versions/3.8/bin/streamlit", line 5, in <module> from streamlit.cli import main File "/Library/Frameworks/Python.framework/Versions/3.8/lib/python3.8/site-packages/streamlit/__init__.py", line 75, in <module> from streamlit.delta_generator import DeltaGenerator as _DeltaGenerator File "/Library/Frameworks/Python.framework/Versions/3.8/lib/python3.8/site-packages/streamlit/delta_generator.py", line 25, in <module> from streamlit.proto import Block_pb2 File "/Library/Frameworks/Python.framework/Versions/3.8/lib/python3.8/site-packages/streamlit/proto/Block_pb2.py", line 21, in <module> create_key=_descriptor._internal_create_key, AttributeError: module 'google.protobuf.descriptor' has no attribute '_internal_create_key' </denchmark-code>
<denchmark-h:h1>Debug info</denchmark-h>
Streamlit version: 0.69.2 Python version: 3.8.2 Using Conda? PipEnv? PyEnv? Pex? No. Just pip & python3. OS version: Mac OS Catalina 10.15.7 Browser version: n/a
<denchmark-h:h1>Additional information</denchmark-h>
I was able to resolve by upgrading protobuf package to 3.13.0. The offending version is 3.11.3, but Pipfile says protobuf = ">=3.6.0" is sufficient but clearly not the case. <denchmark-code>pip freeze | grep protobuf protobuf==3.11.3 </denchmark-code>

comments.comment: This was the first result I saw from Google when I received the same error trying to test the install with streamlit hello. I am on Ubuntu 20.04 and Python 3.9. I upgraded protobuf (pip install --upgrade protobuf) to 3.13.0 and now it is working. Just wanted to say thanks for taking the time to document this issue.
I can submit a PR to requires protobuf>=3.13.0.
<denchmark-link:https://github.com/aht>@aht</denchmark-link> Please submit a PR and our engineers will take a look. Thanks!
